ovdesc.p: This local table is used to parameterize Insiders with Sector.

desc.p: The insider names who has to be considered for the Related Party Transaction report.
Employee, Director, Share Holder and Executive Officer.
Shows the sector codes which denotes the insiders.
Valid SECTOR codes from SECTOR table.
This field PRODUCT.LINE is a multi value field used to select the product line and defined the interest property of the product line being selected.
Shows the properties of the interest associated with the PRODUCT.LINE value
